item.title: Matrix Algebra
item.description:
I encountered a lot of calculation of derivates and integration on matrices when I was learning linear systems and SLAM, but I haven’t learned much knowledge about them. Recently I know about the book Matrix Cookbook, which thoroughly discussed the arithmetics of matrices. Therefore, I post it here for future references.

Contents

  1. 基础内容
  2. 求导
  3. 逆
  4. 复矩阵
  5. 求解与分解
  6. 统计与概率
  7. 多元概率分布
  8. 高斯
  9. 特殊矩阵
  10. 函数与运算符

Source

The book can be downloaded from a website from Technical University of Denmark. If the link failed, you can downloaded from here directly.
